Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 1,200 × 600 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

Summary[edit]

DescriptionFlag of Tuvalu.svg
English: Flag of Tuvalu
Italiano: Bandiera di Tuvalu
Slovenščina: državna zastava Tuvaluja

Colours:

  • Pantone 549C for sky blue used by the British Navy ([1])
  • Pantone 116C for the stars described as 'golden yellow' ([2], [3], [4])
  • Pantone 186C and 280C for the Union Jack ([5])
  • Conversions to RGB values in Photoshop
Date
Source See URL [6] for "officially" credibility and "correctness" of precise star-positions
Author User:Zscout370
iThe source code of this SVG is valid.

Licensing[edit]

 This file is from the Open Clip Art Library, which released it explicitly into the public domain (see here).

To the uploader: Please provide as parameter the link to the page where this image appears.

This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

23:15, 17 January 2006600 × 300 (10 KB)Greentubing (talk | contribs)The "sky blue" is Pantone 549C. Pantone 549C: Cyan = 52% Magenta = 6% Yellow = 0% Black (K) = 25%. Red = 99% Cyan = 153% Blue = 171% Greentubing 23:11, 17 January 2006 (UTC)
03:50, 6 January 2006600 × 300 (10 KB)DiamondVertex (talk | contribs)Lifted the stars from the Open Clip Art version of the Tuvalu flag (PD). Got a PD Union from the Flag of Australia. Changed the sky blue to R74, G132, B165, A255 to match other WP sky blue flags.

This file contains additional information, such as EXIF metadata, probably added from the digital camera or scanner used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details may not fully reflect the modified file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera and may be completely wrong.
